base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray building with minimalist design.
part_description: The building has a vertical arrangement of windows on one side, evenly spaced and rectangular in shape, occupying a small portion of the facade.
internal_interaction_description: The windows are aligned vertically, suggesting a multi-story structure. Each window allows light to enter different floors, indicating separate internal spaces. The uniformity in size and arrangement implies a consistent design theme throughout the building.
external_interaction_description: The building interacts with its environment by providing a visual landmark due to its height. It may serve as a residential or office space, interacting with people who enter or exit through unseen doors. Its minimalist facade may influence the aesthetic of surrounding architecture.
